attributes.action: reverse the Governments policies which have contributed to a collapse in the provision of general practioner health care in this country since 1997.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prior to 1997 we were served by a professional caring GP surgery which responded to our needs and was supportive, In the last decade this service has gradually dwindled to the position where they are unable to provide a basic level of response or care. This is as a result of Government policy. Please do not try to hide this petition as I think you will find that it has great resonance with the British public.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
